DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess immunogenicity safety Rotarix TM administer healthy Taiwanese infant ( age 6 12 week time first vaccination ) receive Hepatitis B immunoglobulin birth .
DOC.brief_title: Immunogenicity Safety Study Rotarix TM Taiwanese Infants Who Received Hepatitis B Immunoglobulin After Birth .
